author: 1Francois1
title: Home away from home
text:
We stayed in the Village at Spier room 302, very nice room but we were upstairs try to get room on the ground floor, nothing wrong with the room upstairs, only thing not right were the aircon that leaked the room cleaning service and repair people were exallant they attend to problems very quick, the surrounding grounds are kept at a good standard, the breakfast is very good and the service out of this world nothing to big service with a smile.
Room Tip: try to get a room on the ground floor but upstairs also OK. See more room tips
